title: Generic weight-loss drug may be safe and effective for long-term treatment

title_detail.value: Generic weight-loss drug may be safe and effective for long-term treatment

summary: An inexpensive weight-loss drug approved 60 years ago for only short-term use also may be safe and effective for longer-term treatment, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: An inexpensive weight-loss drug approved 60 years ago for only short-term use also may be safe and effective for longer-term treatment, according to a new study.
